description.@en: Take one dab of fat, rub between the fingers and a foe will immediately drop whatever is in-hand.

data.distance: Any one person you can see

criticalFailure.@en: Butter weeps from your hands. You are rendered maladroit for 24 hours. You cannot hold anything in your hands without it slipping out of grasp.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above and your foe is knocked Prone.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, one foe instantly drops whatever is in their hands onto the ground just outside of easy reach.

reagents.@en: A dab of animal fat, rubbed between two fingers (expended)
